knimeNode.name: Time Difference
knimeNode.shortDescription: Appends the difference between two dates.

fullDescription.intro: Appends the difference between two dates with the selected aggregation level (year, quarter, month, week, day, hour, minute) and a selected precision for rounding. For the second date/time there are four possibilities. The node can be configured to use the time at execution, the entries of a second column, a fixed date/time, or the time contained in the previous row.
fullDescription.option: Calculates the difference "current time" - "first date column"
Calculates the difference "second date column" - "first date column"
Calculates the difference "fixed date" - "first selected column"
Calculates in row n the difference "first date column in row n" - "first date column in row n - 1". The first cell will be missing.
Select the column containing the start date ("first date column")
Select a second column containing the end date ("second date column"; only for option "Use second column" available)
The granularity of the difference (in years, quarters, months, weeks, days, hours, minutes)
Name of the newly appended column containing the time difference
Select a fixed time as the end date. ("fixed dates"; only for option "Use fixed date" available)

ports.inPort: In data with at least one date columns
ports.outPort: Out data with the time difference appended
